item.title: Scalability Challenge in Karobar Easy
item.description: Namaskaram, The recent growth in Karobar Easy users made the attendanceUpdater Cloud Function fail! This failure caused inconsistency in the database several times. It took 2 rewrites of the entire cloud function to finally fix the issue. This has been a challenging yet interesting journey for me. So, here I am sharing the incident with you all.
